src:
Hari Pahlawan 10 November, Car Free Day Tetap Digelar di Jakbar
06 Nov 2019, 01:58 by Antara, Clara Maria Tjandra Dewi H.
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Hari bebas kendaraan bermotor atau Car Free Day (CFD) tetap digelar meski bertepatan dengan apel peringatan Hari Pahlawan pada Minggu, 10 November 2019.
Hal tersebut dipastikan dalam rapat persiapan pelaksanaan kegiatan CFD yang digelar di Kantor Wali Kota Jakarta Barat, Selasa. "Kalau bisa HBKB tetap dijalankan, karena ini kan program untuk masyarakat," kata Asisten Perekonomian dan Pembangunan Jakarta Barat Fredy Setiawan.
Fredy meminta seluruh jajaran Suku Dinas menyesuaikan acara CFD dengan apel hari pahlawan di Kantor Wali Kota Jakarta Barat. Perwakilan Suku Dinas Perhubungan Jakarta Barat memastikan bahwa personel Sudin Perhubungan siap untuk mengalihkan lalu lintas CFD pada 10 November mendatang.
"Nanti personel kami kemungkinan akan dipecah, ada yang ikut apel dan ada yang ditugaskan pengamanan HBKB," kata perwakilan Sudin Perhubungan Sarnubi.
Hampir 2 tahun Jakarta Barat rutin menggelar Car Free Day atau CFD setiap dua minggu. Sempat berlokasi di kawasan Jalan Tomang Raya, Palmerah, kini CFD berlokasi di Jalan Hayam Wuruk, Taman Sari.
text:
Heroes' Day November 10, Car Free Day Still Held in West Jakarta
Nov 6, 2019, 01:58 by Antara, Clara Maria Tjandra Dewi H.
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Car-Free Day (CFD) is still held even though it coincides with the Heroes' Day commemoration on Sunday, November 10, 2019.
This was confirmed in a preparatory meeting to carry out CFD activities held at the West Jakarta Mayor's Office on Tuesday. "If possible HBKB will continue to run, because this is a program for the community," said West Jakarta Assistant for Economy and Development Fredy Setiawan.
Fredy asked the whole range of Service Tribes to adjust the CFD event with the heroine's day at the West Jakarta Mayor's Office. West Jakarta Transportation Agency Tribal Representatives confirmed that the Transportation Sub-dept. Personnel were ready to divert CFD traffic on 10 November.
"Later our personnel will likely be split up, some will take part in the rally and some will be assigned the HBKB security," said a representative of the Sarnubi Transportation Sub-Department.
Nearly 2 years West Jakarta routinely holds a Car Free Day or CFD every two weeks. Had been located in Jalan Tomang Raya, Palmerah, now the CFD is located in Jalan Hayam Wuruk, Taman Sari.
